name: Zombie Combat Shooting
description:
This zombie sniper game will challenge the city Ghost sniper shooting skills and will test how long you can survive zombie waves

Features:
• Escape & kill braindead enemies in best FPS shooter game!
• Shoot down zombies as real escape sniper shooter!
• Thrilling action packed gameplay of zombie war shooter game!
• High quality 3d graphics, animations & best sound effects!
